location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lord Minto [Gilbert Elliot Murray Kynynmound], Governor General in Council, Fort William, Calcutta

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Governor General that the Resident has granted a set of bills in favour of Messrs Colvin Bazett & Co. in order to meet the disbursements of the Bushire Residency.Enclosed with the letter is a set of exchanges for the aforementioned bills.
